resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82170</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82170</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4652</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fractions (2)</string>
            <string language="es">Fracciones (2)</string>
            <string language="ga">Codáin (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη (2)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable worksheet that tests pupils understanding of halves, quarters and eighths using a given fraction wall.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que se puede imprimir, comprueba la comprensión de los medios, cuartos y octavos de los alumnos utilizando un muro de fracciones dado.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre inphriontáilte a thástálann tuiscint daltaí ar leatha, ceathruithe agus ochtuithe ag úsáid falla codán a tugadh dóibh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedruckbarer Bogen, der das Pupilleverstehen von 
Hälften, von Vierteln und von eighths mit einer gegebenen Bruchwand 
prüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau imprimable qui teste l'arrangement de 
pupilles des moitiés, des quarts et des eighths à l'aide d'un mur 
donné de fraction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha printable que testa a compreensão das 
pupilas das metades, dos quartos e dos eighths usando uma parede dada 
da fração.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro stampabile che verifica capire 
delle pupille delle metà, dei quarti e dei eighths per mezzo di data 
parete della frazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο φύλλο εργασίας που εξετάζει την κατανόηση 
μαθητών των μισών, των τετάρτων και των eighths χρησιμοποιώντας
έναν δεδομένο τοίχο μέρους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
